session_utils

session_utils.get_current_session_key()

Gets current session_key to update current session

Returns

The session_key

Return type

str

session_utils.upload_file(file)

Writes uploaded json file from upload button to current session state

Parameters

file (json) – User uploaded json file

session_utils.write_session_file(state)

Dumps session state into json file.

Parameters

state (str) – name of json file of current session (name of current session + ‘.json’)

session_utils.load_session_file(state)

Loads session state from json file.

Parameters

state (str) – name of json file of current session (name of current session + ‘.json’)

session_utils.write_session_key(session)

Dumps session key as json file.

Parameters

session (str) – name of current session

session_utils.init_starting_values(json_data, material_dict, person_dict)

Returns init data. If no values are set for the specific key, the corresponding value is set to its default.

Parameters

  • json_data – copy of contents of json file of current session as variable, for use in code and modifying of file data

  • material_dict (dict of str: list of float) – dictionary with all the absorption materials as keys and their respective absorption coefficients over octave bands

  • person_dict (list of float) – dictionary with all the person types from DIN as keys and their respective absorption coefficients over octave bands

Returns

init data

Return type

dict of str: int or float or str or dict of str: int or float or str

session_utils.sync_session(state)

Synchronizes session state and json file.

Parameters

state (str) – name of json file of current session (name of current session + “.json”)

session_utils.load_session(state)

Sets necessary session states to starting values and reads contents of session file.

Parameters

state (str) – name of json file of current session (name of current session + “.json”)

session_utils.negate_checkbox(json_data, state)

Negates current state of json_data[‘persons’]. Used on change of persons checkbox to update state.

Parameters

  • json_data – copy of contents of json file of current session as variable, for use in code and modifying of file data

  • state (str) – name of json file of current session (name of current session + “.json”)

session_utils.write_json(json_data, state, num)

Formats user_input number of persons, writes it into json_data and dumps json_data as json file.

Parameters

  • json_data – copy of contents of json file of current session as variable, for use in code and modifying of file data

  • state (str) – name of json file of current session (name of current session + “.json”)

  • num (int) – number of persons in the room

session_utils.write_session_data_to_json(json_data, state)

Dumps session data to json file.

Parameters

  • json_data – copy of contents of json file of current session as variable, for use in code and modifying of file data

  • state (str) – name of json file of current session (name of current session + “.json”)
